summary: The timeline is wrong and the connections are exaggerated

statements.quote: Problem is that the acting head of the FBI & the person in charge of the Hillary investigation, Andrew McCabe, got $700,000 from H for wife!

It was just learned that one of the closest people to Hillary Clinton, with long-standing ties to her husband and herself gave more — this just came out — gave more than $675,000 to the campaign of the spouse — the wife — of the top FBI official who helped oversee the investigation into Mrs. Clinton's illegal email server. So the man that was investigating her from the FBI, his wife runs for office and they give her more than $675,000 to run.

But we have also just learned that one of the closest people to Hillary Clinton, with longstanding ties to her and husband, the closest -- the closest person, I can tell you that, gave more -- listen to this -- just happened yesterday. Gave more than $675,000 to the campaign of the wife of a top FBI official who oversaw the investigation into Mrs. Clinton's illegal e-mail server. In other words -- in other words the man who was in charge of the investigation of Hillary Clinton accepted essentially from Hillary Clinton $675,000 that went to his wife.

name: Hillary Clinton gave almost $700,000 to wife of FBI agent investigating her
